book.title: Scarlet Heat Part 1: Blood-Bonded: (Paranormal Vampire Werewolf Romance) (Born to Darkness (Scarlet Heat part 1))

review.body:
Love it!

This book sucks you into the story quickly, I did not even want to put it down from the moment I started reading it.I am going and getting the rest of the series.I don't want it to end.

My original A Man & His God audiobook review and many others can be found at Audiobook Reviewer.

book.title: Sex and Marriage My Best Friend's Daughter and Loving My Best Friend's Daughter

review.body: 1st one all about sex...2nd one involves a bit of plot to justify all the sex.
طبق الأصل على واقعنا
a little slow to start. entering a new universe can be painful because you do not understand ANY OF THE WORDS. an interesting story.
Could not put down. Werewolves with a difference. Alternate universe with "Others" in charge of things.

review.body:
About the Book:
In this first book of the Tales from the Goose Creek B&B, you'll fall in love with a small town that feels like coming home. Its quirky characters and their many shenanigans will make you laugh out loud as they touch a place in your heart.

book.title: $2.00 a Day: Living on Almost Nothing in America

review.body: When conducting research in 2010, Edin, who had been researching poverty for 20 years noticed a fundamental change in many families she interviewed—they were living without any visible cash income. In the summer of 2012, Edin joined forces with Shaefer, a leading expert on the Survey of Income an...
I think it was a very good book and the graphics were awesome!

I LOVED LOVED LOVED LOVED this book!!!!
I love the characters. I love the story. I love the feeling in my heart after the story ended.
PERFECTION!
Really enjoyed this book. As a Year 1 mum that HATES playground politics it was recommended to me by a similar-minded mum! Easy to read and enjoyable.

Watership Down is my favourite book of all time. I often revisit the world of rabbits. It is incredibly well-written and the use of rabbit-language really brings this too life, not to mention the incredible descriptive work.

Worth a read, always.
Good follow up to the 5th Wave. More insight into the other characters. Really like this one.
inspired me to read more fairy tale twists....
Stevens is quite the fabulous narrator. The movie was also excellent, though I prefer the final scene in the book.

book.title: The Alpha Billionaire Cowboy's Baby: A BWWM Billionaire Western Romance

review.body:
It's ok

The actual book stops at 5 percent. Yes 5 which was extremely short. There are about 7 bonus books after that story. A few were good but some I gave up on and skipped around. I should have read the reviews but the book that was supposed to be the main book was good.

book.title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time

review.body: This book has no merit at all. Why it us selected for any purpose by anyone us beyond me.

Interesting read!

It is a quick read! Grabs and keeps your attention! I would recommend to young adults and adults! I enjoyed it
